spec.name: Tamaris Aquapark
spec.description: Tamaris Aquapark is a large water park located in the Tamaris area near Casablanca, offering a range of water slides, pools, and recreational facilities. As a major seasonal entertainment complex, it caters to families and tourists seeking leisure and cool relief during the hot summer months.

access.comment: The park is typically open seasonally during warmer months; ticket price varies.
